translation: &About the Tool

If you associate the tool with the .vmd or .vpd file extension, you can launch the viewer by double-clicking the file.
You can also check for missing standard bones and morphs.
Viewer
Settings
Settings Description
Save Model Settings
Model File

id: モデルファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a model file. Pmx or X files can be opened.
・You can set the Pmx model to be applied when opening a motion.
・Click the save button to save the model path and close the window.
Motion File

id: モーションファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a motion file.
Vmd or Vpd files can be opened.
Failed to Save Settings

id: 保存エラーメッセージ
translation:
Failed to save model settings.

Error message: {{.Error}}
[OK] Bone
Bones that exist in both the motion and the model.
[OK] Morph
Morphs that exist in both the motion and the model.
[NG] Bone
Bones that exist in the motion but not in the model.
[NG] Morph
Morphs that exist in the motion but not in the model.
Successfully Saved Settings

Model settings have been successfully saved.
Please close the window.
If you have not yet associated the file extension, please do so.

Model path: {{.Path}}

id: IK・外部親なし保存失敗
translation: Failed to save IK/No External Parent Motion

id: IK・外部親なし保存失敗メッセージ
